name: Crystalreach Islands
description:
Crystalreach Islands is an open-world action RPG. Battle various enemies, gather gear, explore the world and fly the skies around the islands.
Experience the fantasy setting by getting to know the world, progress your character by gathering gear, items and unlocking skills.



Progress
Mix the different equipment together without any class or level limits and make the perfect build for your style of gameplay. If you can get the gear, you can wear it. Experience a variety of stats that armor pieces give and experiment with various combinations. Try the differing abilities the weapons you obtain give you and unlock skills to compliment your weapon of choice.


Battle
Pick between three combat styles of using melee, magic or ranged weapons freely. Battle a variety of melee and projectile enemies with unique loot drops and find the weapon that best suits your play style.


Explore
Visit the islands, discover and explore the dungeons, reach for the skies and the world hovering above you. Visit the towns around, visit the shops, have a chat with the inhabitant characters and discover opportunities awaiting you.
